descriptor.name: Longway Blaze Quartz Room Heater 800W
descriptor.short_desc: Longway Blaze Quartz Room Heater 800W
descriptor.long_desc:
Give a new and refreshing look to your home with the elegant design by Longway. The Longway room heater is capable of delivering the warmest air flow without any hassle. This room heater is designed under the supervision of many professionals who ensures the quality check and energy efficiency.
 
  
 Type: Quartz; Rod: 2 Rod; Wattage: 800 Watts; Outer Body Material: ABS (Plastic). 
 Highest Saving: Advanced heat resistant Technology for Power Savings. Perfect if you want to go green. Quality check: 5 safety function and 15 Quality check by team of professionals to ensure best product for you. Extra heavy duty halogen rods for extra heating & durability. 
 Product Features : Superior ABS Plastic Body, ISI Marked & BIS approved Heating Element to ensure powerful heating. ISO Approved Company & 5 Star Rating. Thermostat and Auto Cut out with cutting edge latest technology by Automatic Instruments (Al). 
 Package Content : 1 Set of room heater, Installation Manual 
 Warranty Period : 1 Year Comprehensive Longway Warranty.

descriptor.name: Longway Superb 10 Ltr 5 Star Rated Automatic Storage Water Heater for Home, Water Geyser, Water Heater, Electric Geyser with Multiple Safety System & Anti-Rust Coating | 1-Year Warranty | (Gray, 10 Ltr)
descriptor.short_desc: Longway Superb 10 Ltr 5 Star Rated Automatic Storage Water Heater for Home, Water Geyser, Water Heater, Electric Geyser with Multiple Safety System & Anti-Rust Coating | 1-Year Warranty | (Gray, 10 Ltr)
descriptor.long_desc:
Give a new and refreshing look to your decor with the elegant design by Longway. The Longway Electric Geyser is capable of delivering hot and steamy showers with no hassle. This electric geyser is designed under the supervision of many professionals who ensures the quality check and energy efficiency.

 1. Type: Storage, Capacity: 35 Liters, Wattage: 2000 Watts, Pressure: 6.5 Bars, BEE Rating: 5 Star Rated Energy Efficient Geyser Inner Tank Material: Stainless Steel (SS) Tank with special Anti-Rust coating - 2X Corrosion Resistance; Outer Body Material: Metal (CRCA).

 2. Highest Savings : BEE 5-star rated with Advanced heat resistant Technology for Power Savings. Perfect if you want to go green. Quality check: 5 safety functions and 15 Quality checks by a team of professionals to ensure the best product for you. Extra heavy duty element for extra heating & durability.

 3. Product Features : Superior polymer coated tank, nano poly bond technology for excellent corrosion resistance and oxidation resistance even in high temperature and pressure 100% ISI Marked & BIS approved Copper Heating Element to ensure powerful heating.

 4. Package Content : Electric Geyser, Instruction Manual

 5. Warranty Period : 1 Year Limited Domestic Brand Warranty on Product & 5 Years on Inner Tank/Container. Enjoy the hassle free warranty by Longway on your product.

Thermostat and Auto Cut out with cutting edge latest technology by Automatic Instruments (Al).
Installation Manual, 1 Installaion kit, 1 Set of geyser

descriptor.name: Longway Hot Max Room Heater Fan 2000W
descriptor.short_desc: Longway Hot Max Room Heater Fan 2000W
descriptor.long_desc:
Give a new and refreshing look to your home with the elegant design by Longway. The Longway room heater is capable of delivering the warmest air flow without any hassle. This room heater is designed under the supervision of many professionals who ensures the quality check and energy efficiency.
 
  
 Meant for Spot Heating, Room Size: Up to 250 sq. ft. 100% Pure Copper Wire Motor for long life 
 Ideal for a small / medium room only, i.e., up to 250 sq. ft. when operated at 2000 watt heat setting. Makes some noise due to fan. Body Material: Plastic, Metal 
 Plug type: 15A, do not plug in the standard 5 or 6A socket, you may require a 3 pin plug or extension cord to act as a 5-15A convertor but cannot be used for long time with extension cord 
 Non sagging, stitching type and long life heating element, Safety cut-off, Overheat Protection 
 Thermal cut-off for added safety, Two heat settings-1000 watts and 2000 watts.

descriptor.short_desc: Longway Magma Fan Room Heater 2000W
descriptor.long_desc:
Give a new and refreshing look to your home with the elegant design by Longway. The Longway room heater is capable of delivering the warmest air flow without any hassle. This room heater is designed under the supervision of many professionals who ensures the quality check and energy efficiency.
 
  
 Meant for Spot Heating, Room Size: Upto 250 sq ft. 100% Pure Copper Wire Motor for long life 
 Ideal for a small / medium room only, i.e., up to 250 sq. ft. when operated at 2000 watt heat setting. Makes some noise due to fan. Body Material: Plastic, Metal 
 Plug type: 15A, do not plug in the standard 5 or 6A socket, you may require a 3 pin plug or extension cord to act as a 5-15A convertor but cannot be used for long time with extension cord 
 Non sagging, stitching type and long life heating element, Safety cut-off, Overheat Protection 
 Thermal cut-off for added safety, Two heat settings-1000 watts and 2000 watts
